AboutPage.title: About Bansa
AboutPage.subtitle: We're building the next generation platform to empower businesses and individuals.

mission.content: At Bansa, our mission is to create innovative solutions that address real-world challenges and improve people's lives. We believe in building technology that's accessible, inclusive, and beneficial for everyone.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly seek new ideas and solutions to stay ahead.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We're committed to ethical practices and transparency.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe great things happen when people work together.
